dct_title_s: Plan of the city intended for the permanent seat of the government of t[he] United States : projected agreeable to the direction of the President of the United States, in pursuance of an act of Congress passed the sixteenth day of July, MDCCXC, "establishing the permanent seat on the bank of the Potowmac" : [Washington D.C.]
dct_description_sm: At upper right: Office, Commissioner of Public Buildings, D.C.; Lacks printer's statement.; Facsim. of ms. L'Enfant plan.; Printed in black only.; Includes texts containing letters dated "Washington ... 1887," notes, descriptive index of "References," and U.S.C. & G.S. insigne. Lacks text below "N.I."; At lower right: N.I.; In right upper margin: Number 3035a price 50 cents.
70 x 81 Centimeters, on sheet 81 x 121 Centimeters
dct_publisher_sm: United States Coast and Geodetic Survey (Washington)
